titles.title: May it never be (that I should boast)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
May it never be
that I should boast
Except in the cross
of our Lord Jesus Christ
Through which the world
is crucified to me
and I to the world

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For from Him and through Him
And to Him are all things
For from Him and through Him
And to Him are all things
To God be the glory
forever, Amen
To God be the glory
Forever, Amen

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
To God be the glory
forever, Amen
To God be the glory
Forever, Amen
